talk_1015: <sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry_01>After all, I have a master to avenge!<sp:1:3:4:5a000000>
talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>Excuse me, traveler...<sp:5:0:0> Do you know me,
by any chance?

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Who am I? <sp:5:0:0>WHERE am I? <sp:5:0:0>Am I a villain?<sp:5:0:0>
Or an ally of justice?
talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry_01>Well, in that case, I can't let you go home
in one piece, can I?<sp:1:3:4:5a000000>
talk_1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry_01>Enter the Yiga Clan—allies of justice!
Judgment has come for you,
villainous Link!<sp:1:3:4:5a000000>
talk_1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>I knew that was it!<sp:5:0:0> Thank you! Now I
remember everything!
talk_1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry_01>Enter the Yiga Clan—allies of justice!
Consider this your divine punishment
from Master Kohga!<sp:1:3:4:5a000000>
talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal>What gives? You looking for a fight?


<sp:3:0:2:0900>People will realize I'm in the Yiga Clan
if you get too close, you moron!

What'll I do if my perfect disguise gets
found out?! The jig will be up!
